summary: DT*: THE CONTACT STATED WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS OR IDLING, THE SPEEDOMETER READING WAS INCORRECT.  THE SPEEDOMETER READ ZERO INTERMITTENTLY WHILE DRIVING, OR IT READ ONE HUNDRED MILES PER HOUR WHILE SITTING STILL.  THE VEHICLE WAS DRIVEN TO THE DEALER, WHO DETERMINED THE ELECTRONICS OF THE SPEEDOMETER NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  *AK  UPDATED 12/15/2006 - *NM
